[[File:Nasforatool.jpg|thumb|200px|Nasforatool the Vampire]]
{{Quote|Buffay, are you going to plunge your stake into my dark places?|Nasforatool}}
'''Nasforatool''' is a character from the pornographic film ''[[Buffay the Vampire Layer]]''. In the film, Nasforatool has sex with 'The Vampire Layer'. <small>("[[The One Where Chandler Can't Cry]]")</small>

==Behind the Scenes==
* Nasforatool is portrayed by [[Douglas Looper]], who is credited as 'The Vampire'.
* Nasforatool, is a reference to ''[[Wikipedia:Nosferatu|Nosferatu]]'', a 1922 vampire horror film, directed by F. W. Murnau. Though technically, the vampire's name was Count Orlok.

==Appearances==
* "[[The One Where Chandler Can't Cry]]"
